title: Flight Attendant
overview: Kinisha Dandekar has built a happy life for herself. She has some great friends and a job she does with utmost efficiency. Her life seems to be going as per plan, until one small incident threatens to shatter her world, forcing her to come face to face with her dark past. So, when her worst nightmare resurfaces, threatening to destroy everything she has built, she must confront it head on, once and for all.
